name: Tennessee Tuxedo
preparation:
The Tennessee Tuxedo is the kind of recipe you pull out for special occasions. A splash of amaro and pear liqueur, along with a hint of smoked maple syrup, all serve to showcase the gold standard of Tennessee whisky, George Dickel No. 12.

Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir.

Strain into a coupe glass.

Garnish with a lemon twist.
